body.h1: Welcome to WSO2 Message Broker v2.0.1
body.p: WSO2 Message Broker (WSO2 MB) is to be your Message Broker System. Our ultimate goal is to provide you with the suitable message brokering service.

MB 2.0.1 supports publishing and receiving messages both online and on demand with the features Pub/Sub and Queues. Message broker compatible with JMS API and it implements AMQP 0.91 protocol.
WSO2 MB 2.0.1 is developed on top of the revolutionary Carbon platform , and is based on the OSGi framework to achieve the better modularity for your Service Oriented Architecture (SOA). This also contains a lots of new features and many other optional components to customize the behavior of the server. Further, if you do not want any of the built in features, you can uninstall those features without any trouble. In other words, MB can be customized to your SOA needs.
You can download this distribution from Project Download Page and give it a try.
